course_title: Professional Series Course II: Nursing Inquiry and Scholarship
class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 2 students only. Online with synchronous sessions via zoom.
course_description: The course introduces the role of research in nursing and healthcare. Students are introduced to research in nursing and healthcare using a variety of methods of inquiry to develop skills necessary to understand and apply research findings to clinical nursing practice.
sections: Class Nbr: 1803, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: TTh 2:30-4:30p, Instructor: A. Horigan, Status: Open
